item.title: ‘Selling Sunset’ and ‘Selling the OC’ Add Four to the Cast, Including Sandra Vergara, Sofía’s Sister (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: When “Selling Sunset” and “Selling the OC” premiere on Netflix later this year, there will be some new faces at the Oppenheim Group, including Sandra Vergara, Sofía Vergara&#82
